summary: David Warner is an Australian international cricketer and a former captain of the Australian national team.

value.label: Left-handed opening batsman, part-time spin bowler and aggressive fielder

image.altText: Style of play for David Warner

value.label: Warner made his first-class debut playing for New South Wales against Western Australia.
Warner made his international debut for Australia in a Twenty20 International against South Africa at the Melbourne.

The South African national cricket team, nicknamed the Proteas is administered by Cricket South Africa. South Africa is a full member of the International Cricket Council (ICC) with Test, One Day International (ODI) and Twenty20 International (T20I) status.

image.altText: Image of South Africa national cricket team

value.label: Warner was dropped from the team after the first match due to a off-field fight with English player Joe Root
Warner was signed by IPL team Delhi Daredevils for 2009â€“10 seasons.
The Delhi Capitals are a franchise cricket team that represents the city of Delhi in the Indian Premier League (IPL).
Warner is the first Australian cricketer in 132 years to be selected for a national team in any format without experience in first-class cricket

image.altText: Warner is the first Australian cricketer in 132 years to be selected for a national team in any format without experience in first-class cricket

value.label: Warner is the first Australian batsman to score 7 ODI centuries in a calendar year

image.altText: Warner is the first Australian batsman to score 7 ODI centuries in a calendar year

value.label: Warner is the first Australian and sixth overall to reach 1,500 T20I runs.

image.altText: Warner is the first Australian and sixth overall to reach 1,500 T20I runs.

value.label: In 2015, Warner became only the third batsman in history of Test cricket to score centuries in both innings of a Test match thrice

image.altText: In 2015, Warner became only the third batsman in history of Test cricket to score centuries in both innings of a Test match thrice

value.label: The Australia national cricket team is the joint oldest team in Test cricket history, having played in the first ever Test match in 1877.
The SunRisers Hyderabad (often abbreviated as SRH) are a franchise cricket team based in Hyderabad, Telangana, that plays in the Indian Premier League (IPL)
The New South Wales cricket team (currently named NSW Blues) are an Australian men's professional first class cricket team based in Sydney.
